action.action-desc: Mr. Richmond (for himself, Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia, and Mr. Conyers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 relative to the powers of the Department of Justice Inspector General.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Inspector General Access Act of 2017.

section.header: Investigations of Department of Justice personnel
section.text: Section 8E of the Inspector General Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and paragraph (3);
by redesignating paragraphs (4) and (5) as paragraphs (3) and (4), respectively; and
in paragraph (4), as redesignated, by striking paragraph (4) and inserting paragraph (3); and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking , except with respect to allegations described in subsection (b)(3),.
